name: Tangerine kernel
long_description: This is the Tangerine kernel for Xperia SP. It's compatible with all Lollipop ROMs! Sources are on Github. Enjoy it!
features: CPU governors: performance, powersave, lionheart, interactive, intelliactive, intellidemand, ondemandplus, userspace, conservative
I/O schedulers: fifo, sio, row, vr, zen, fiops, test, bfq, sioplus
TCP congestion control algorithms: westwood, bic, highspeed, hybla, htcp, vegas, veno, scalable, lp, yeah, illinois
Userspace I/O driver support for HID subsystem

downloads.name: v9.0
downloads.description: Tangerine kernel v9 - another big update!
changelog: built with GCC 5.2 and UBER Toolchain
GPU idle frequency set to 200 MHz
check XDA for more, I'm lazy and I don't want to write everything here :)
